data.title: Halah Food
data.text: Eat in or take out.  Their foods are specifically prepared for those who desire strictly Halah foods.  They have a hugh variety of meals from beef, to seafood, to smothered turkey wings or just a large sized hamburger or sub made to order.  Large healthy portions makes you return whenever you are in their area.  You will also enjoy their large single sized desserts which you will share.  A great inexpensive place for lunch or before a game at the Stadium which is only a few steps away.
